ygData.subject: RE: Level 38 Song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... aye the Psalm series has a big advantage over the Guardian series. The Psalm songs give resist bonus in excess of what guardian gives with a drum at the
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 38 Song
>Date: Wed, 15 Dec 1999 15:14:27 -0500 (EST)
>
>On Wed, 15 Dec 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> > And I have been a bad bard <tsk tsk> lev 37 and 38 songs are waiting for
>me
> > in the bard guild still. Not like the old days where you really looked
> > forward to making a level and getting a good song. <sigh>
>
>I've found the psalm series extremely useful. In fact, I was invited down
>to the spider room/bedroom camp in lower guk, and kicked myself for not
>having bought Psalm of Purity beforehand.
>
>Athren
>
>
>---------------------------------------------------------------------
aye the Psalm series has a big advantage over the Guardian series. The Psalm
songs give resist bonus in excess of what guardian gives with a drum at the
expense of only boasting one resist. So if you know you need a certain boast
(say poison for fighting Nox) just mem the correct Psalm and weave it in.
One night a party I was in took on good old Nox, I memed Psalm of Purity &
the cleric buffed poison resist & no one in the group got poisoned. And for
those you you that do not know Nox's poison is very nasty.
